description: This file defines a Qwik-based React-like route component for a notes application, including UI logic, state management, and component rendering for note CRUD operations, user authentication, and layout structure.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads notes array from local storage, parsing JSON or returning empty array on error.

methods.name: saveNotes
methods.description: Saves notes array to local storage as JSON string.

methods.name: loadUser
methods.description: Loads user data from local storage, returning null if absent or invalid.

methods.name: saveUser
methods.description: Saves or removes user data in local storage based on input object.

methods.name: uid
methods.description: Generates a unique identifier string based on random and timestamp.
